text: Winter sports are sports played during winter. They often must be played on ice or snow. The International Olympic Comittee has the Winter Olympics, which are every four years. In the Winter Olympics, people try to win at winter sports for their country. Cold countries, for example Russia, Canada and Norway, are good at winter sports. Winter sports include: *Ice skating *Skiing *Snowboarding *Sleighing *Bobsleighing *Ice Hockey *Bandy *Curling *Snowmobile
title: Winter sport
